title: Going Places
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 48 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: This simple early-level reader shows students different ways they can get around, from planes to horses. Photos accompany the text in one-to-one correspondence for easy reading.
reviewWords: bike, boat, bus, car, horse, plane, skateboard, train
comprehension: Compare and Contrast                : Compare and contrast information
awareness: Sound Discrimination                : Discriminate initial consonant /b/ sound
phonics: Consonants : Identify and read words with initial letter Bb
grammar: Capitalization and Punctuation                : Understand that sentences begin with a capital letter and end with punctuation
wordWork: Content Vocabulary                : Understand and use content vocabulary
